recipes.name: Boeuf Bourguignon
recipes.method: Preheat the oven to 350°F. Cook bacon in a Dutch oven until crisp. Remove the bacon and set aside. Add beef to the Dutch oven and brown on all sides. Remove beef and set aside. Add onion and garlic to Dutch oven and cook until softened. Add wine and beef broth, and bring to a simmer. Add the beef, bacon, carrots, and bouquet garni to the Dutch oven. Cover and cook in the oven for 2-3 hours or until the beef is tender. Remove the bouquet garni and serve.

recipes.name: Coq au Vin
recipes.method: Preheat the oven to 350°F. Cook bacon in a Dutch oven until crisp. Remove the bacon and set aside. Add chicken legs to the Dutch oven and brown on all sides. Remove chicken legs and set aside. Add onion and garlic to Dutch oven and cook until softened. Add wine, chicken broth, and tomato paste, and bring to a simmer. Add the chicken legs, bacon, bouquet garni, pearl onions, and mushrooms to the Dutch oven. Cover and cook in the oven for 1 hour or until the chicken is cooked through. Remove the bouquet garni and serve.

recipes.name: Salade Niçoise
ingredients: 1 head of lettuce, washed and torn
1/2 cup green beans, trimmed and cooked
recipes.method: In a large bowl, combine the lettuce, tuna, eggs, green beans, tomatoes, and olives. In a small bowl, whisk together the red wine vinegar, olive oil, Dijon mustard, salt, and pepper. Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
